医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，无法充分获得简单的择期手术会使更多人面临生命危险一项新的研究显示，发展中国家无法充分获得简单的择期手术，这正在为患者埋下未来的健康问题，并可能造成未来健康并发症的螺旋式上升，使更多人面临生命危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Inadequate-access-to-simple-elective-surgery-puts-more-peoples-lives-at-risk-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Inadequate-access-to-simple-elective-surgery-puts-more-peoples-lives-at-risk-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=882e60b4-addd-4e7e-8226-cd63c4f80b0d Thu, 23 May 2024 22:19:51 -0400
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究将自闭症的遗传风险和大脑变化联系起来由加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心领导的一项开创性研究揭示了自闭症背后复杂生物机制的最详细视图，首次显示了该疾病的遗传风险与观察到的大脑不同层的细胞和遗传活动之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/UCLA-research-connects-genic-risk-and-brain-changes-in-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/UCLA-research-connects-genic-risk-and-brain-changes-in-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eab7af1f-5a1c-4741-9fa6-00ac00fd5e4f Thu, 23 May 2024 21:40:05 -0400 UCLA research connects genetic risk and brain changes in autism
丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究显示乳腺癌幸存者的妊娠结局令人鼓舞丹纳—法伯癌症研究所研究人员的新研究为乳腺癌幸存者并想要孩子的年轻女性带来了令人鼓舞的消息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Dana-Farber-research-reveals-encouraging-pregnancy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Dana-Farber-research-reveals-encouraging-pregnancy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c4d39a0-a6f4-4c33-ab39-7685212e79c3 Thu, 23 May 2024 21:34:15 -0400 Dana-Farber research reveals encouraging pregnancy outcomes for breast cancer survivors
UMSOM 获得 396 万美元赠款，用于接种新生儿败血症孕产妇疫苗马里兰大学医学院 (UMSOM) 疫苗开发和全球健康 (CVD) 中心的研究人员获得了 396 万美元的资助，用于开发一种孕产妇疫苗，用于预防新生儿和婴儿由肺炎克雷伯菌引起的败血症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/UMSOM-receives-24396-million-grant-for-maternal-vaccine-against-neonatal-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/UMSOM-receives-24396-million-grant-for-maternal-vaccine-against-neonatal-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e69cfc5d-59b8-4550-9206-e953e193a2fa Thu, 23 May 2024 21:28:48 -0400 UMSOM receives $3.96 million grant for maternal vaccine against neonatal sepsis
新的人工智能模型通过卓越的癌症诊断为数字病理学树立了基准研究人员开发了 Prov-GigaPath，这是一种使用新颖的视觉转换器架构的全玻片病理学基础模型。该模型在突变预测、癌症亚型分型和视觉语言任务中表现出卓越的性能。它利用来自 30,000 多名患者的大规模真实数据来增强临床诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-AI-model-sets-benchmark-in-digital-pathology-with-superior-cancer-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-AI-model-sets-benchmark-in-digital-pathology-with-superior-cancer-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a8d2f90-686a-44b9-9646-38b342ae9298 Thu, 23 May 2024 21:06:00 -0400 New AI model sets benchmark in digital pathology with superior cancer diagnostics
研究发现生酮饮食有望治疗焦虑、抑郁和其他精神健康障碍研究表明，生酮饮食可能有助于控制焦虑、抑郁、压力、精神分裂症和双相情感障碍，但需要更多的临床试验来证实其功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-treating-anxiety-depression-and-other-mental-health-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-treating-anxiety-depression-and-other-mental-health-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bad967d0-651e-4b1d-b29a-4f42ddce669d Thu, 23 May 2024 20:30:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet shows promise in treating anxiety, depression, and other mental health disorders, study finds
研究发现，产前双语接触可提高婴儿的言语敏感性研究人员发现，产前接触母语会影响新生儿对语音的神经编码，双语接触会增强对更广泛频率范围的敏感性。这表明早期的语言环境从出生起就塑造了听觉处理能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Prenatal-bilingual-exposure-boosts-babies-speech-sensitivity-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Prenatal-bilingual-exposure-boosts-babies-speech-sensitivity-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b160e74f-ece5-477d-8909-0b06d2469015 Thu, 23 May 2024 20:22:00 -0400 Prenatal bilingual exposure boosts babies' speech sensitivity, study finds
小鼠研究发现父亲接触 PFAS 会扰乱后代的基因表达研究表明，雄性小鼠在怀孕前接触 PFAS 会改变精子甲基化，并影响其后代肝脏和脂肪中的基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Mouse-study-finds-PFAS-exposure-in-fathers-disrupts-offsprings-gene-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Mouse-study-finds-PFAS-exposure-in-fathers-disrupts-offsprings-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccd0b032-f05a-4a77-91c8-fd89380d652f Thu, 23 May 2024 19:58:00 -0400 Mouse study finds PFAS exposure in fathers disrupts offspring's gene expression
樱桃和浆果：天然的心脏健康甜蜜疗法研究论文回顾了樱桃和浆果中酚类化合物对心血管的益处，强调了它们在减少炎症、氧化应激和改善血脂方面的潜力。经常食用这些水果可以显着降低患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Cherries-and-berry-Naturee28099s-sweet-remedy-for-a-healthy-heart.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Cherries-and-berry-Naturee28099s-sweet-remedy-for-a-healthy-heart.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=402f8455-374c-46f3-a026-9218b3d8738e Thu, 23 May 2024 19:31:00 -0400 Cherries and berries: Nature’s sweet remedy for a healthy heart
新研究显示，富含类黄酮的饮食可将 2 型糖尿病风险降低高达 28%根据营养与糖尿病杂志的一项研究，增加富含类黄酮食物的摄入量可以显着降低患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Flavonoid-rich-diet-slashes-type-2-diabetes-risk-by-up-to-2825-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Flavonoid-rich-diet-slashes-type-2-diabetes-risk-by-up-to-2825-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=717e9373-8afa-4842-9ca2-b8d3e9f6a94d Thu, 23 May 2024 19:00:00 -0400 Flavonoid-rich diet slashes type 2 diabetes risk by up to 28%, new study reveals
